    • Constructor Detail

      • CrontabUnit

        public CrontabUnit(java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String precondition,
                   java.lang.Boolean quiet,
                   java.lang.String user,
                   java.lang.String command,
                   java.lang.String dayOfWeek,
                   java.lang.String month,
                   java.lang.String dayOfMonth,
                   java.lang.String hour,
                   java.lang.String min,
                   java.lang.String failMessage)
        Unit test for setting up a crontab, with custom fail message. Follows the crontab style for intervals
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the unit test (with _crontab appended)
        precondition - Precondition unit test
        quiet - Redirect errors on the cron job to /dev/null
        user - The user to run as
        command - The command
        dayOfWeek - The day of the week (0-6/*)
        month - The month (1-12/*)
        dayOfMonth - The day of the month (1-31/*)
        hour - The hour (0-23/*)
        min - The min (0-59/*)
        failMessage - The fail message
